name: micro-blog-books
description: Manage your Micro.blog book collections, bookshelves, and reading goals through Claude
long_description:
# Micro.blog Books MCP Server

An MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that provides access to the Micro.blog Books API, allowing Claude to manage your book collections, bookshelves, and reading goals.

## Features

### Bookshelf Management
- Get all your bookshelves
- Get books in a specific bookshelf
- Create new bookshelves
- Rename existing bookshelves

### Book Management
- Add new books to bookshelves
- Move books between bookshelves
- Remove books from bookshelves
- Update book cover images

### Reading Goals
- Get your reading goals
- Track progress toward specific reading goals
- Update reading goal targets and progress

## Usage

Once installed, you can ask Claude to help manage your books. For example:

- "Show me all my bookshelves"
- "Add a new book called 'Project Hail Mary' by Andy Weir to my 'Currently reading' bookshelf"
- "Move book ID 79 to bookshelf ID 23"
- "What are my reading goals for this year?"
- "Update my reading goal to 25 books"

## Security

This extension requires your Micro.blog bearer token to authenticate with the API. The token is stored securely in your local configuration and is only used to make API requests to Micro.blog on your behalf.
